detaileddescription.para: This directory contains the source code related to the implementation of the frontend of KIVI compiler.

listitem.para: parser/ In this folder resides the implementation of the syntactical analyzer used in the first stages of the compilation process

ir_generation/ This directory is used for the implementation of the stage which is responsible for "translating" the already generated AST into a more assembly-like architecture-independent simplistic language called intermediate representation

detaileddescription.para: For the next steps of the compilation process check the backend/ directory.
